entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [LSP] All requests for opened source generated documents fail #60434
  • Test plan for UnsignedRightShift feature #60433
  • System.ArgumentException in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.OperationMapBuilder #60424
  • SemanticModel ignores evaluation context introduced by checked/unchecked expression #60419
  • Add API to incrementally find usages of a type. #60417

Closed

  • False positive in IDE0078 (use of pattern matching) #57199
    17.3
  • Analyzer to check line length does not exceed predefined value. #60422
  • Investigate if adding a quote should not trigger quote-completion in the case that it would terminate an existing string. #59178
    17.2
  • This code compiles in 3.x but doesn't compile in 4.x #60418
  • [Responsiveness] Roslyn initialization is forced onto the UI thread, forcing the project system to synchronize initialize it (6.9% of solution open) #55297
    17.2
  • Suggestion to remove a delegate cast results in warning #60423
  • Please support highlighted fields and attributes #60180
    Backlog
  • IDE0078 diagnostic shows up without the code fix in CSharp CodeStyle NuGet package #45569
    Backlog
  • `await` is not highlighted in top-level statements when clicked #60400
    17.3
  • Odd behaviour with async method declaration: bad keyword suggestion #60340
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add UnsignedRightShift feature to "Language Feature Status.md" #60435
    Area-Compilers
  • Update Versions.props and PublishData.json for 17.2 P3 snap #60432
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main-vs-deps #60431
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to release/dev17.2 #60430
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #60429
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Port 'Top Level Statements' code style PR to 17.3 #60426
    Area-IDE
  • Support adding new assembly level attributes with SyntaxGenerator when some already exist in the document #60425
    Area-IDE
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60415
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers

Updated

  • Avoid checking HasValue in nullable comparison for non-default constants #60405
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support SetsRequiredMembersAttribute #60392
    Area-Compilers
  • Show linked symbol in Inheritance Margin #60225
    Area-IDE
  • Add BoundArrayInitialization.IsInferred #60391
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support lambdas and local functions, eliminate duplicate code #60335
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Check accessibility before offering "Implement interface" codefix #60297
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Move StackTraceAnalyzer over to VirtualCharSequence #60404
    Area-IDE
  • Add Rebuild badge to README #60298
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Features/utf8 string literals #59774
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only
  • [LSP] Remove the majority of usages of client name. #60357
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • [semi-auto-props]: Disallow 'nameof(field)' #60384
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add feature to convert from top-level-statements to Program.Main form #60383
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Pause taggers when they are not visible. #60371
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unreported telemetry #60321
    Area-IDE
